name: Traffic Eyes
description:
A quick game made to experiment with some ideas, mostly it's a stream of consciousness game where you talk to different figments of my imagination.

(Some screens have flashing lights, so I advise against playing if you suffer from epilepsy)

Made with Bitsy, Bitsy Audio, Imade-to-Bitsy, and Borksy.

The background tune is an original piece called Trip Arteries.
